lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: My husband and I are small business owners and we can relate to the daily struggles one can endure and small business are the backbone of society!

lender.name: Ryoshi
lender.loan_because: i don't really need loans, i need people to help me out
lender.occupational_info: in progress

lender.name: Ashtin Vanderbilt
lender.loan_because:
I greatly appreciate that KIVA was established to truly help those in financial need that have no other viable means to survive or get ahead in life.
Everyone deserves an opportunity to get ahead in life if they are willing to do the work. Especially those who have significantly fewer resources and opportunities available to them.
There is nothing more rewarding in life than "Paying It Forward"! AV
lender.occupational_info:
Ashtin Vanderbilt began his luxury real estate career in Paris, France in 1987 and has been representing clients as a real estate consultant here in the Northwest since 1997. Since 1987, Ashtin has successfully closed or actively participated in countless transactions and millions of dollars in real estate sales volume both in the US and abroad. His real estate expertise is in contract law, contract negotiation, home marketing, raw land development, new home construction and highest/best use property evaluation.
Ashtin's unique ability to help his clients select the right investments in real estate worldwide has allowed them to realize impressive financial gains in home appreciation, and significantly above market averages. In his 20 plus year career, Ashtin has worked or consulted with CEO's, doctors, lawyers, sports figures & celebrities. Ashtin's stellar reputation for being discrete and highly ethical has allowed him to develop close personal & business relationships with a very high profile clientele.
Ashtin's assets and abilities as both an expert negotiator and world traveler have allowed him to incorporate many unique and diverse facets into his professional business acumen and service repertoire. Ashtin has given real estate seminars to hundreds of buyers, sellers and investors as a real estate consultant. Ashtin specializes primarily in high-end luxury single-family real estate, waterfront/view, new construction, penthouse high-rise condominiums and land development. Ashtin would readily help any client find suitable property for their specific needs in any price range and location.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Kammy asked me to! And gave me a credit for my first loan. I can't wait to see how this works out! Hi to Zenobia in Bolivia!!!
lender.occupational_info: I live in Florida. I am married and have three children. I work writing proposals for governments and NGOs.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering others to be self reliant helps them to be productive and happy. By extension, self reliant people makes the global community a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers in American schools teach students about financial literacy and social change.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I would like to be a little bit of light in a dark world.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: It is our responsibility in this world to help others - we are our brother's keeper.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of a loan versus a handout/donation. A handout helps someone for only a moment; by loaning someone money, they are able to improve themselves and their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to support the investment of insurance premiums so that future claims may be funded.

lender.name: Toosje
lender.loan_because: to strengthen worldwide the female energy,because we can make the difference

lender.name: J Patrick Ritchie
lender.loan_because: People everywhere are family to me.

lender.name: Scott & Joellen
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do!

lender.name: Chris and Annie
lender.loan_because: I have worked in many locations around the world and seen first hand how many hard working people can benefit from a small loan. It is amazing how much a little bit can help in these places.
lender.occupational_info: Police dog trainer/handler Police Secretary

lender.name: PJS
lender.loan_because: I don't have much and I don't earn much but I'd like to think that the little help that I give out makes a big difference. That's why since I have more time than money, I also try to participate in http://freerice.com
lender.occupational_info: I'm a flight attendant who works in the plane for customer service on board as well as making sure of the safety of our passengers. I have seen both beautiful and sad places in my line of work which inspired me to try to help out as much as I can with the preservation of culturally rich but economically deprived countries.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I want to be a doctor.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. I care about people in other places and I like to learn about people who live around the world. I put my savings in Kiva instead of the bank so it can be used better.
lender.occupational_info: I am in second grade. I like soccer and basketball. I want to be an engineer and build cars and planes.

lender.name: Smith Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I help people build well-designed, efficient and enjoyable communities.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: People are created in the image of God. When you see people in that image, the sufferings of poverty are no longer tolerable.

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I believe in the "good" in people; I am a Christisn, trying to make the world a better place, one person at a time-for my Grandchildren's world.
lender.occupational_info: I assisted U.S. citizens to have a better life.......

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: Because I can.And especially to those who need a little support,only an opportunity to change their lives so they can lead a more secure,dignified and self-reliant life.Being involved in finance, I understand how the rich have easy access to capital,but the odds are stacked against poorer people who truly need loans to improve their circumstances.Plus I respect those who are looking for a small break and not asking for a handout.Kiva's micro-finance concept helps us all to contribute in transforming some lives, which in turn helps build better and happier communities,therefore leading to a more desirable world.Because of the personal aspect ,I am also able to empower women who face greater social and economic challenges.
lender.occupational_info: I mentor and guide people to achieve their goals of financial security via acquisitions of income producing property. So I understand the importance of helping people get loans to improve their lives.Kiva provides a micro-financing platform to help make a difference in those people's lives who need a loan the most, and yet have the hardest time getting it.

lender.name: Miguel Fernando
lender.loan_because: Aportar al desarrollo del pais, mediante las expresiones artisticas. propiciando de esta manera visiones de un futuro mejor para los necesitados
lender.occupational_info: dibujos, talleres, conferencias, seminarios, que permitan la participacion de jovenes

lender.name: Eliana
lender.loan_because:
I care, it feels good to help others and I have been blessed with everything I have in my life.
I was given some money to make 4 (my favorite number) loans as a gift from my better half, Marc, for Valentine's Day. We both would like to help people in need instead of buying each other useless Valentine gifts. ;O)

lender.name: winpuppy
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Josh
lender.occupational_info: I research how robots can learn and adapt to new environments.

lender.name: Burns!
lender.loan_because:
I like the (almost) direct contact of choosing a specific entrepreneur , and the ability to follow-up to see exactly where the money goes and how it helps.
I'm not just donating money to some giant faceless charity that may use the funds to help someone, or maybe to purchase more ads to generate more donations, or maybe to pay some overpaid CEO. The money that I loan goes directly to an actual person and makes specific impact.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to help entrepreneurs in developing nations, particularly women, support their families and a more sustainable livelihood. I have plenty to share. This is a sustainable program, not just a donation, and I like the person-to-person contact made possible by the internet.
lender.occupational_info: I convene conferences and retreats for entrepreneurs in the sustainability change movement to help them collaborate and spend their time and money effectively. I also design and deliver leadership capacity building programs. If someone wants to get better at any aspect of leadership, such as team building, working collaboratively, and developing a vision and getting others on board, I can help them do that.

lender.name: Vicki Snyder
lender.loan_because: I believe that women should help other women become independent so that they can take care of themselves. It's also my way of sending love to women all over the world from America.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a buyer for a large corporation. Now I travel, garden, and look for ways to help women in other parts of the world to promote love, peace independence and respect

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: It is so easy and it helps other people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites, and I work with computers. And it's fun :)

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: We have been self employed most of our lives. We respect people who believe in themselves enough to be entrepeneurs and we want to help them succeed.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: My son got me started by setting this up as a birthday gift. I think it is a wonderful way to help those that really need it to get started or build their business. It is great that I can make it a perpetual gift.

lender.name: Rachel & Steve
lender.loan_because: We want to help someone else be able to live the life they want and provide for their families. We all deserve to be able to live well and care for our families especially those willing and able to work.
lender.occupational_info: We love to read, create items for friends and family, and we love volunteering in our community. We travel a bit as a family , and we like to camp and hike. We're on a mission to live the best lives we can.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it's my duty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Tennessee in Knoxville, TN, and I am currently studying to be a civil engineer.

lender.name: Fern
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my grand-daughter how important it is to help others. And I also want to make the world she grows up in, a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a new grandmother. My granddaughter has so much and I want to teach her that it is important to help others.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: access to finance shouldn't just be for the rich but for anyone who wants to work hard and make their business a sucess.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the Deputy Director of Green Alliance - an organisation that campaigns for ambitious solutions to climate change and other global environmental issues.

lender.name: Chie
lender.loan_because: It's great if someone benefits from my small amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: translator

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: knowing that I'm helping people around the world - even just a little bit - makes be feel that I can make a difference in this big world. Seeing them smile makes me smile.
lender.occupational_info: I put down in words what other people feel and think about. Sometimes it's poetry, sometimes its greeting cards, sometimes it's just words.

lender.name: Weiss-Li
lender.loan_because: I think it's a beautiful thing to help people with good ideas and intentions, yet cannot acheive those dreams due to small financial roadblocks. I want to help and know that one day because people like me, they can see their planted seeds blossom into a forest of oppurtunity one day. Everyone should have an equal chance to do, built & believe in their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Restaurant Owner & State commissioner.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: just because.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the mail room of a jesuit university in denver colorado.

lender.name: Eric & Wendy
lender.loan_because: these people can invest our money better than we ever could.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.occupation: Program Specialist for Student Involvement at PLU

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: I have been a proponent of micro enterprise lending since the early days of Muhammed Yunus and the Grameen Bank. I believe that lending empowers poor people to be able to educate their children, to have access to better housing, food, safe water, etc
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes in Virginia, right outside of Washington DC. I am also a yoga teacher and yoga therapist.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it's an awesome opportunity to make loans around the world where a small amount of money can make a big difference for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct group dance exercise classes to help women stay fit and healthy

lender.name: Marques Family
lender.loan_because: it matters and it has an impact. We believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and understand the need for support.
lender.occupational_info: We live in Los Angeles and have two sons - Diego 3 and Matteo 7 months - Felippe is a commercial real estate broker and Gabriella is a film producer.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Because I want to make the world a better place for us all.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to be in a position where I am able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach ten/eleven year old students with learning disabilities.

lender.name: Connie & Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who help themselves...who are taking charge of their lives and changing it for the better...I admire their courage!
lender.occupational_info: We are retired now but we owned our own furniture business for over 20 years.

lender.name: AHG
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Moeen
lender.loan_because: What we earn, seems like it only belongs to us. I believe, the lord in-trusted us with everything we have so we can share it with those who have less. Having said that, it is not like I give a lot but I feel like, I NEED to.
lender.occupational_info: I am in Information Technology field.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have received with women around the world who want to care for their families. I am a follower of Jesus Christ and He taught often about compassion and generosity to the poor. I know that most people prefer independence over charity, so if I can help a family start a business through Kiva, they can succeed and help others as well.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: A little can go a long way. Hope this helps you.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: My 8 year old son did the research for which person he wanted to give our loan to. We earned the money by recycling bottles and cans. We believe that we can make a difference in the world by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a licensed midwife (deliver babies) and a licensed cosmetologist (hairstylist) by trade but I have been a stay at home Mom since the birth of my children.

lender.name: Celia
lender.loan_because: It feels good.....such a small amount of $ can change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Our company vision is to change the world one person at a time.

lender.name: Linda & Roger
lender.loan_because: Jesus told us to reach out to others and give and we have decided to do just that. We feel we are so blessed in this country and we are to serve others - KIVA is one way we can reach out and help to equip people to live productive lives.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired and stay busy around our 5 acres in the woods.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I have given to the MSSRF Foundation in India for many years. This is another fine way to help bring prosperity to many around the world. These loans are really in the name of my very young daughter Sally and my sister Kerry!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a patent firm dealing with associates and clients all over the world

lender.name: Quin
lender.loan_because: I like helping people
lender.occupational_info: i'm superman, don't ask

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus
lender.occupational_info: I work as a carpenter and also design and build websites.

lender.name: kevin
lender.loan_because: buying my way into heaven

lender.name: Vermillion
lender.loan_because:
I basically want a world where people can dream. Dreams push people to set goals, goals push them to take action, action leads to success and success leads to bigger dreams. I loan because it helps this process.
DO NOT CONTACT ASKING TO JOIN GROUPS!! I'm not at all fond of this shallow social networking phenom.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Giving is the heart of Jesus Christ
lender.occupational_info: Giving brings HOPE to the hopeless

lender.name: Kacy
lender.loan_because: Because I have been blessed enough to find myself in a position to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand how and why people make the economic decisions that they do, and then try to teach others how to do it better.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to be in need of help, and also the feeling of when someone is there for you. Now I want to give someone else that feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I have the privelage of working for my dad who does drywall and also owns the buisness, I also work at the local ski resort as a snowboard instructor. Then I own a small sheep buisness. I have 9 ewes all with 2 possible lambs on the way. I then have them prosessed and am able to provide custom cut meat to my customers.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I truly care about other people than myself and want to help all humans live equally.
lender.occupational_info: I learn so that one day i can work to help change the world for the better.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I like helping people achieve their dreams for a better life!
lender.occupational_info: I take people out on horse back rides in the mountains and take care of horses!

lender.name: clyde
lender.loan_because: Giving is like getting a hug.
lender.occupational_info: Computer repair

lender.name: Itzi & Dave
lender.loan_because: We've heard several radio programs about micro-loans and their success in improving communities and relieving poverty. This is a great way of giving an opportunity to individuals around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We study the Cosmos, and train a new generation of young scientists.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Assisting others to achieve their dreams is just one small way I can help make the world a better place. I Love Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I assist families in the purchase and or sale of their home(s).

lender.name: Rob and Cheryl
lender.loan_because: we all need to work together to make the whole world a better place
lender.occupational_info: I work for a town trying to balance development growth, the laws, and the character of the community. My wife teaches teachers how to be better; helping children read and learn.

lender.name: Vay
lender.loan_because: I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of monies.

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the IT infrastructure - servers, network, and computers - for a small manufacturing company located in Canada.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I have been given opportunities in my life to do good things, and I want to give other people the same opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I help people build better software, and companies get more value from investments in IT.

lender.name: Philip and Diane
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others that may be less fortunate, but have a dream and a desire to succeed.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: God has asked us to help those in need

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: i'm interested in other cultures
lender.occupational_info: i play music for money

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: Everyone on the planet deserves an opportunity to put their talents and hard-work to good purpose. Too much money gets frittered away on lattes and can go to better use by those who can make it grow and sustain entire families.
lender.occupational_info: My work deals with helping communities make good decisions about land uses: often for development or renewal and sometimes with luck for land protection.

lender.name: KFC
lender.loan_because: We are called to love and care for our neighbors.

lender.name: Bob, Rita & Dylan
lender.loan_because: It's time we help those less fortunate. We all need help at some point in our lives.
lender.occupational_info: We are a fireman, developer and builder who appreciates hard work. We were raised that your word still means something.

lender.name: Joanie
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the change I want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of money for people in business.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: it's cool.
lender.occupational_info: I Produce Independent Films and Provide Technology Services

lender.name: Scott & Aryn
lender.loan_because: it is important to use our blessings to empower others.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It takes money to make money....it's just that simple. Yet, very few budding entrepreneurs in the developing world have access to the cash needed to get started or grow their businesses. I believe providing loans gives people the ability to support themselves and in doing so they support others and build community.
lender.occupational_info: I own a men's apparel company. We make underwear, swim and loungewear.

lender.name: cordell
lender.loan_because: i just want to help a little

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed and would like to help, even if it is small amounts at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US Navy as a Police Officer.

lender.name: Hanh
lender.loan_because: people lend me money when I needed it.

lender.name: Liz
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with Autism

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupation: Owner of a Fair Trade company
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and want to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Because I care and because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people to be ethical, honest and competent lawyers.

lender.name: Khadija
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to help
lender.occupational_info: I'm material planner at the airport, responsable for the logistics of aircraft parts

lender.name: Jacek
lender.loan_because: I think that small things CAN change the world!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe every one should have the opportunity to better their situation and provide for their family, no matter where they live.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student, studying a masters in psychology, I am also a mother of two young children.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: it is the best investment I think I can be involved in!
lender.occupational_info: I work as an during the day and ride or take photos at every other opportunity

lender.name: Atsushi
lender.loan_because: I have exprienced investment into Viet Nam while my business days. I still have several intimate friend there.
lender.occupational_info: We organise and run an association of retired senior citizens in local area to activiate senior people. We have several fields of activity. One of them is international relation promoting that I am responsible for.

lender.name: Loren
lender.loan_because: As a Baha'i, (http://www.bahai.us) I am firmly to committed to helping out those who are less fortunate. Loaning with Kiva is a way for me to pool my limited resources with the resources of others to make a big difference in the lives of those who are struggling to get ahead in life. It is one small way for me to collaborate with others who want to eliminate extreme poverty, and bring the world together. Everyone can do something to make a difference! The more we work together in unity, the bigger the change we can affect, and the better conditions will become for all members of our human family.
lender.occupational_info: Presently, I am teaching English to non-native speakers, on the island of Sakhalin, in the Russian Far-East. I am passionate about my work because it empowers my students to take advantage of global economic opportunities that might otherwise be denied them.

lender.name: Marie
lender.occupational_info: I am finishing my last year of law school.

lender.name: Familie Keplinger
lender.loan_because: me and my wife want to teach our 2 sons that a little help can change a lot

lender.name: Busari
lender.occupational_info: i repair electronic engines and i rent out musical instrument like speakers and engine.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping someone to help themselves is the best way of helping.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because:
I like being able to see a connection with the people I loan money to. Living in Tokyo, I am blessed with a good job and many opportunities. It is a privilege to be able to loan any amount of money or time and I am happy to have the chance to do so.
Entrepreneurship creates jobs and is the best development tool for any economy. Even in Japan, the government is turning to entrepreneurship.
Ultimately I think that Kiva could really unleash a lot more power by allowing people in developing countries to loan small amounts to other people in other developing or developed countries. I think that this would really empower people by breaking the concept that they are not successful and need to get loans.
Entrepreneurs everywhere have cash management issues. This is where Kiva can help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Ecocert SA and manage their Japanese subsidiary. We are an organic certification company. Organic certification gives many farmers in developing areas a chance to get a higher price for their crops. This leads to them putting more money into their community.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I really loved the story of Grameen and the idea of microlending.

lender.name: M Smit
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful rewarding feeling to help someone in need
lender.occupational_info: We sell properties and developments in South Africa, especially along the Garden Route in SA

lender.name: Tim
lender.occupational_info: I teach secondary students in Maths and Science.

lender.name: Swiss Ladies
lender.loan_because: We find Kiva a really interesting project. We are happy to help people to start up their own business.

lender.name: Edgar
lender.loan_because: Because I care about the World

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I like to help people getting independend by enterpreneurship
lender.occupational_info: I train and coach people and organizations to get better personal and business results.

lender.name: Johan Karlbom
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: Student at Stockholm School of Economics, major in management

lender.name: Polo
lender.loan_because: I know how important is, when you have great ideas, but no money to invest into.
lender.occupational_info:
My work is to create a life I want for myself, putting as much effort into it, as I can.
And part of that plan is helping others
There's a saying: "Be the change you wish to see in the world"

lender.name: Elke
lender.loan_because: This gives me an opporunity to help improve the world, one little loan at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist in drug research

lender.name: Asta
lender.loan_because: microfinancing works!

lender.name: RR
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO START A NGO ORGANISATION IN INDIA TO WORK FOR SOCIETY AGED, POOR, WOMEN, ETC
lender.occupational_info: OLD AGE HOME, HOSPITAL HEALTH CARE TO POOR, CHILD, WOMEN WEAKER SECTIONS, THOSE WHO NEED HELP AND SUPPORT. HELP IS GOD.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but spent a number of years in aviation and the last 13 years building a medium sized retail business with a couple of outlets

lender.name: Ramon
lender.loan_because: It's a briljant way to connect people and share opportunities

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good about myself.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer for an organization that builds homes for low income families. Habitat for Humanity. I also take college courses online.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing is a great idea, made even better by internet. Moreover, it serves as a kind of "paying back" for me: I never cease to learn and profit in many different ways from getting to know people while traveling in "poor" countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching logics and theoretical computer science at a university of technology. I am traveling a lot, mainly in Asia, Europe and (Latin) America.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love the Lord. And I loan because the Lord loves me and He loves you too!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a farmer. We grow corn, alfalfa, wheat and soybeans. We also raise dairy heifers.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I enjoy business and think it's a great way for people to make money and improve life for themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I help small companies learn about business and become larger companies.

lender.name: Martine
lender.loan_because: i

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: It's a satisfying way to make a difference person to person.

lender.name: Thomas STRADNER
lender.loan_because: In Februar 2007 i have a privat Crash. I have everything lost. In this dark site of my life i found new motivation. Yet i have my own business and i think it is a moral commitment for everyone to share when we have good times.
lender.occupational_info: I give Motivations and Power Seminars - Don´t dream it, DO IT

lender.name: Giovanni
lender.loan_because: I want to help the peolple who want to work.
lender.occupational_info: Constantly changing

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help other people; I really want to make a difference and I feel like this is one small way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in a University in Japan. I am a language professor

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I can. Not everyone in the world is blessed with so many opportunities to live a succesfull life. By lending money to entrepeneurs around the world I can help give them an opportunity to success.
lender.occupational_info: I check financial annual reports.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I have met many women struggling to make ends meet and am engaged in projects supporting ministries with trafficked women--trafficking and lack of viable employment opportunities for women go hand-in-hand. Kiva gives me the opportunity to support women entrepreneurs and job creation globally.
lender.occupational_info: National staff person in women's ministries for my denomination

lender.name: Jared
lender.occupational_info: I design graphics that represent products and services for advertising.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Just know how happy those people will be when they know the're not alone outthere~~~~^.^
lender.occupational_info: Restaurant

lender.name: Toren
lender.loan_because: Creative, passionate individuals are the backbone of resourceful communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying international development at Georgetown University in Washington, DC

lender.name: robin
lender.loan_because: It is an easy and efficient way of improving the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage international research studies of investigational medicines.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It gives someone a chance to improve.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves the chemical analysis of plant material for nutritional content.

lender.name: Suzanne P
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that I can help others

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: there's no better way to use my money

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: To loan $25, I only have to forgo 5 visits to my local coffee shop. What's more important in this world, helping fight poverty or a double espresso? Well, some mornings I think it's the espresso ;) but in all honesty I know I'd much rather do my part to try and help in this world!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, creating games, websites, business systems and other programs for people to use.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I love to see other worlds thrive by giving what I don't need.
lender.occupational_info: My work is family oriented, much like those whom I lend money to. We love to work together and I believe that it can be very successful.

lender.name: Alex Alyssa Kaylyn
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the lives of others!

lender.name: Varady
lender.loan_because: The world is in all of our hands.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am glad that I can make a differencein someones life and because I am able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I support the CEO of the company I work for.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Living in America I have opportunities that others will never have unless I help.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an online Bible called YouVersion.com

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I learned about this concept in Freidman's The Earth is Flat, and the organization yesterday in Clinton's Giving. I wanted to see if I could be of some help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Supreme Court Judge assigned to hear felony cases.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want to be a good example to my son. Also, there have been times in my life when a small amount of money would have been a big help. I hope it will be a big help to others.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an international institution where I conduct research on the state of the global economy and financial markets.

lender.name: Elise & Natasja
lender.loan_because: We care and it's the least we can do.
lender.occupational_info: Elise: grandmother of Ciarán and Natasja: IT project manager and mother of Ciarán

lender.name: Chuck & Rita
lender.loan_because: It is the BEST way to help people directly!!!!
lender.occupational_info: College Professor & Computer "Geek"

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping uplift my fellow human citizens.
lender.occupational_info: I manage technicians who work on telephone, internet, and video equipment.

lender.name: ryan
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to put their ingenuity, energy, and passion into practice.
lender.occupational_info: market and sell computer products

lender.name: Serah
lender.occupational_info: I work for a toy company that makes environmentally friendly, non-toxic organic cotton toys. My position is Director of Busines Development and Strategy, I work on figuring out how to expand our mission in green business.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give to those budding entrepreneurs around the world who want to build a better life for themselves and be independent and free.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of software developers who provide ways for people to get more information and improve the process within which they work.

lender.name: Beth
lender.occupational_info: I grow vegetables to sell at market, I manage political campaigns, and I help community groups plan for financial sustainability.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: A little help can sometimes make an enormous difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a businessman. I advise the management of large organisations. I help them improve their performance or their profitability.

lender.name: Tory
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a exhibit marketing company that improves the way other companies market their products to possible buyers at various events. My role is to make sure that everything goes well at the event, and that we stick to a pre-determined budget. I basically do what a wedding planner does, but, instead of planning weddings, I work on events that show-off cars, software, and gadgets for the purpose of encouraging possible customers to purchase the products on display,

lender.name: kim
lender.loan_because: People gave me a "leg up" when I needed it,I like to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very fulfilling! I like people and work with people and kids.

lender.name: Barret
lender.loan_because: I would like to support the growth and development of industrious people around the world who don't have all of the opportunities that have been present in my own life. In this way, I also wish to demonstrate that the sometimes undemocratic actions and policies of the US Government do not always represent the sentiments of it's citizens.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of each day writing computer programs, sometimes like this very website!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Because I can. and should
lender.occupational_info: Graduate looking for work

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupation: Bad dancer and Chemist for hire
lender.loan_because: I can and it's sort of fun.

lender.name: Dawndrea
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I and other Canadians and American's take advantage of the beautiful parts of these developing countries, but going to the resorts there doesn't contribute back much to the local community or inner cities!...This way helps a little bit.

lender.name: Yohanna Isreala
lender.loan_because: I want to Touch as many LiVEs as I can thoughout the World and KiVA makes that POSSiBLE............

lender.name: Jochen
lender.occupational_info: I am helping to automate any kind of processes to improve transparenzy and efficiency

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I've started my own successful business and it's given me great satisfaction. I'd like to give other people the same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: We program computer software and web sites using Java and FileMaker Pro.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand at some point in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the business matters of a public school system.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Micro lending is an empowering way to provide support to those wishing to uplift themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Provide information to help people lead healthier, more vibrant lives.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: We are all part of the same world without equal opportunities.

lender.name: april
lender.loan_because: We were put on this earth to help and serve one another. I only wish I could contribute more.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a school library for special education, Deaf and Blind students. We check-out adaptive equipment such as braille and large print books. braille paper, switch's, braille note takers.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Kawan
lender.loan_because: no one should be denied the chance to work towards their goals simply because of their financial situation—not when others have the ability to help.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help people.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: I can afford to
lender.occupational_info: Building things

lender.name: Cat and Sandy
lender.loan_because: We love the feeling it gives us to know we're helping!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it makes a lot of sense and it's easy.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people do their jobs.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I've had other people help me get my business off the ground, and I would like to return the favor to another entrepreneur.

lender.name: Pascal
lender.loan_because:
I want to be rich!!!!
What?!?! I won't be rich on Kiva ?!?! Crap...

lender.name: Boye
lender.loan_because: It helps others and to learn about others.

lender.name: Xan
lender.loan_because: My friend Andrew gave a donation gift to get me started.
lender.occupational_info: I'm still mostly learning.

lender.name: Search4CareerColleges
lender.loan_because: The Search4CareerColleges.com team has a similar philosophy as Kiva, we help people change their direction in life through opportunities to start a new career path. It’s a perfect match for us to get involved with. We desire to see more businesses lending on this site.
lender.occupational_info: Our Search4CareerColleges.com site helps people look for technical schools and find the right career training program for them.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Kindergarten.

lender.name: Robbin
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to pay it forward. We are all in this together!
lender.occupational_info: I raise Alpacas for their warm fiber. They are a renewable source, humane and earth friendly! They also are so much fun to love and hug!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because:
I too come from a country that is considered to be 3rd world. I began my company in a country other than where I am from. I too know the difficulties of being an Entrepreneur; with no one believing in my abilities as an entrepreneur.
I hope with a loan; I am able to contribute to someone's dream of becoming an Entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Event Planner. I currently work freelance, but aim on developing events for my company.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I was born into a good family and a comfortable life in an affluent society. I am well educated, in good health and have choices in my life. I recognize this good fortune and I want to be able to share it with others who have not been so fortunate, but who are working to change their situations and create better lives for themselves, their families and children.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves helping other people to find within themselves the power to change. Life coaching is a professional service in which coaches work with individuals (or groups) who desire a change in their lives but who may feel stuck in a current situation or way of being. Coaches believe that individuals have their own inner resources to solve their problems or attain their goals. So my job is to be a partner with the client, providing him or her with a different perspective and some techniques and action plans that help the client to find the solution within, take steps forward, and reach his or her goals.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to build themselves the life they wish to lead. Not everyone has been given the opportunity to do so and through this website and others like it people are able to create more productive and healthier lives for them and their families.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: $25 to someone in need is better than buying beer or video games.
lender.occupational_info: I sell coffee, make custom drinks, and try my best to make each customer's day a little brighter.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. I often give to charities, but never see what happens to the money I give. For once I would like to see my money at work, and when it's done...be able to have someone else benefit from the same money. I want to make a "gift that keeps on giving." People not only make a living, but also build confidence, pride, and respect for themselves as they earn their own money!! I want to be part of that. I also want to return a small part of what God has blessed me with to others!! I don't have alot of money, but I have been blessed enough to help make a difference...that's what I want to do!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed accountant. I do work out of my home out of a small office. I also raise livestock...pygmy goats and horses...for fun, but also a little income. I am very involved in the life of my young son. So, I try to work many different small jobs so that I can be a mother whenever he needs me. I am also a college instructor that teaches accounting on a contract basis at a college. I work nights, so I can be home with my son when he comes home from school. When he's grown, I hope to have just one full-time job as an instructor at the local college. I hope then I can help more people in areas like this because I'll have more of the financial ability to do so!!!

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: We loan as the PaixQuebecPeace conference to thank our speakers and panelists for contributing their time to our project.
lender.occupational_info: Exposing people from different backgrounds, with different opinions, and different experiences to one another to explore how we can better live together. The forum is a daylong, bilingual peace-education conference in Montreal.

lender.name: Natalie Portmans head
lender.loan_because: It creates opportunities to get a Head.
lender.occupational_info: Natural

lender.name: CCLA
lender.loan_because: Teaching the kids the importance of giving and how you can change the world.

lender.name: Bill & Donna
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to fufill thier dreams. By helping others, we help ourselves.

lender.name: ClarkUSEClass
lender.loan_because: This account was setup for Clark University's Social Entrepreneurship Class in 2008. We'd like to thank our professor for encouraging us to get involved with this site.
lender.occupational_info: We are students. Our work is reading and writing. Then we graduate and enter the real world.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I am saving for my retirement, but hate the idea of all that money sitting in the bank for the next 50+ years. So I am investing it in Kiva, so that while I wait I can help the world, like Jesus would
lender.occupational_info: I don't have a real job yet :) This money is all from babysitting or gifts.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: Don't mind giving money. Looks like this might work over time.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: There is a difference between wants and needs. All my life, my needs have been fulfilled with ease, as have many of my wants. In Costa Rica, I see people struggling every day just to meet very basic needs and I am overcome with a sense of guilt and gratitude. As a child, I learned that "to whom much has been given, much will be expected." As an adult, this means to me that if I have the ability to help others, then to do so is a moral obligation. Not a choice.

lender.name: Eve
lender.loan_because: I feel this is one area I can help impact the world I live in and help make it a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that schools have the technology they need to teach students effectively

lender.name: Dennis and linda
lender.loan_because: We want to help make an impact
lender.occupational_info: Dennis is a chef for special children and Linda is an artist and teacher of special adults with disabilites

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: I believe everbody deserves a shot at life! I count my blessings every day and I wish for everyone to live your dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a a grocery store in The Netherlands.

lender.name: Ørjan
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: This just may change the world.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I care for the best.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a mechanic to make new ideas work.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough. I want to share, help enrich another woman's life.
lender.occupational_info: 911 emergency phone operator & radio dispatch for law enforcement, fire & medical.

lender.name: Mom- Isabelle and Brodie
lender.loan_because: My favorite cousin gave me this present to give! I want to teach my children how to make this world a better place if we help people in need of making their own world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time mother to my young children.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: You get a chance to do something small yet magnanimous in someone elses life. You invest and you give hope to someone thousands of miles away
lender.occupational_info: Develop screenplays and projects to make into small to mid-size feature films.

lender.name: Lynne & Liz (1936-2011)
lender.loan_because: I want the world to change, and I want to help with that change.
lender.occupational_info: Liz liked to think of herself as a philosopher, rather than a writer. But she did write a book, The descent of religion: its evolution from nurturing to bullying . . . and back!, which is available on Amazon.

lender.name: Robert Hernandez
lender.loan_because: there are those who have all the will in the world to succeed but lack the money to get started. No one who wants it so bad should be denied the opportunity to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I coach families and individuals on how to make their money grow.

lender.name: Barb and Todd
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I loan because Kiva is a much better alternative to traditional "charity". The people who receive the loans are allowed to maintain their dignity and self respect because of 2 fundamental principles found here, namely, hard work and financial responsibility. Traditonal charity has neither of these principles, which is why it will never work in the long run.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a GIS (Geographic Information System) specialist. In simple terms, GIS is is a combination of a relational database and a mapping program.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: it can change people's lives and build communities.

lender.name: Jeanette & Dominique
lender.loan_because: ...it makes a positive difference to both the lender and the recipient :)

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work in a retail store

lender.name: Sryn
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility to help others up the 'ladder'.
lender.occupational_info: I teach how to use computers to secondary school students.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be better than it is now, and I know I can do small things to make sure that happens.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a profession that is very meaningful to me. I spend a lot of time travelling around the world.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: It is important to give back. Such a simple gesture.
lender.occupational_info: I have always given of myself to my community, it is time to give to orthes.

lender.name: Mason
lender.loan_because: My $25 means a lot more to them than it does to me.

lender.name: louise
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world be a better place for us all. To help elminate poverty and hunger and give those receiving loans a great gift of self esteem.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and have worked many years in accounting and have raised a fun family of 3 children.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: Helping someone else is one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself and the planet.
lender.occupational_info: I write letters to foundations asking them to give money to non-governmental organizations who help people in need.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I want to act globaly.
lender.occupational_info: Shaping minds and developing futures.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It is such a blessing to me to reach out to people I will never meet, and somehow touch their lives in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph people at different stages in their life, as babies, when they graduate, and amongst family members

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: These people deserve my money exponentially more than any corporation in America.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: my small contribution has the greatest reach and impact when it is combined with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology to train, analyze, develop and improve business processes and data usage - I strive to make companies more efficient and more productive.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Because I can and I care.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a physician in a Hospital Emergency Department.

lender.name: Jim and Cate
lender.loan_because: Hope and hard work can lead to wonders large and small.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to support people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to work to improve their lives.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I've had too much in life, and too many have had too little. This is a step toward righting that wrong.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer and editor interested in international affairs, development economics, and football, among other issues.

lender.name: Paedaretus
lender.loan_because: I lived in Jakarta in 1997 and have fond memories of the place. I hope I can help. And now I am disappointed to see that we have almost no one in Indonesia we can lend to. I wonder why.

lender.name: Clint and Amy
lender.loan_because: We think Jesus would if He had a credit card. Plus, We like to help people help themselves. It just feels good!
lender.occupational_info: Clint puts out fires, Amy teachers kids

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with financial resources. I believe I have an obligation to share with others and to be a good steward.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for the accounting and financial reporting for a Fortune 500 Company. I have an obligation to the Company's investors to prepare and report accurate financial results.

lender.name: kinnosuke
lender.loan_because: I want someone to be happy with my little help.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: It's important to me to help to break the cycle of poverty. I am convinced that micro-finance is one way to accomplish that.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I believe you should be the change you want to see.
lender.occupational_info: I research and learn about people of African descent all over the world.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important for people to share with one another. It opens my heart to share and I love supporting others to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I write nonfiction books about spirituality and health. And I counsel people who want to write books about how to get published.

lender.name: Adam and Mary
lender.loan_because: Our life is great, and we want to share our good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: Adam fixes the connections between computers across the world. Mary works for a doctor, is in charge of all the medical assistants, and makes the serum for allergy shots.

lender.name: Jonathan and Lesley
lender.loan_because: We want to help out people who need help, and we love the idea that our assistance can be used many times over by reinvesting our loan once it's paid back. What better way to make our globalized world feel a little smaller and more human?
lender.occupational_info: Jonathan works at a newspaper, where he writes about art and music and books. Lesley is an artist who teaches young adults how to make art. We have one son named Abraham, who is three and loves people.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: Social capital is the most precious commodity in which we can invest.
lender.occupational_info: I help explore the many ways technology improves our existence.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to make an impact in somebody's life, and you can see how your donation is making positive changes in the world
lender.occupational_info: I protect the health of the public, by monitoring food, water sources and air quality for issues that may cause harm to human health.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-loans human and economical impact.
lender.occupational_info: I create advertising campaigns for business owners in the US and in France.... colorful logos, unique web sites and magazine ads are my day to day environment... I love working with business owners and I can't wait to tell them about KIVA

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I have traveled extensively around the world and have seen first-hand the spirit and determination of people of all nationalities to better their lives and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: The gift of a massage is one of easing pain, whether it be physical or emotional. The miracles of touch cannot be explained by science but have the power to change the world...one person at a time.

lender.name: Tim and Ilene
lender.loan_because: Our business would have gone under if not for the generosity of a benefactor loan. We want to "pass it on" in a what small way we can.
lender.occupational_info: We own a restaurant in an economically depressed rural community in the Ozark Mountains.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about the Earth, agriculture and trying to help end rural poverty.
lender.occupational_info: In my own business, I am working to change the way big American companies do business. Showing them how their buying decisions affect rural poverty helps them to adopt fairer business practices that give more of the economic benefits of global trade back to the small farmer.

lender.name: Terukazu
lender.loan_because: I can connect to many people

lender.name: Khadija
lender.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of every individual.

lender.name: Lynsee
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I loan because I have access to limitless opportunities and abundance that a vast majority of people in the world today will never know. I have a roof over my head, clean running water, heat in my home, a variety of nutritious food, electricity, a selection of clothing, transportation, a job, access to education, quality health care, freedom of religion and politics, security, equality, no threat of any kind to my life or the lives of my loved ones, and I have so much more than all this. I loan because it's the least I can do to help those who do not share these basic human rights.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: The more people help each each other the more peaceful the world will be.
lender.occupational_info: I am a technology coordinator for a public school district. I maintain about 400 computers, keep the servers running in two buildings, help teachers with technology professional development, and many other tech related tasks.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva by my salon owner, Sherry McGuire. I now loan because everyone needs a little help sometimes, and I am also a small business owner! I understand that it takes a little extra push sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I provide hairstyling and other beauty services. I also educate other hair stylists, teaching hair color theory, techniques, cutting, and texture techniques.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to make the world a better place for families.

lender.name: Takahiro
lender.loan_because: I want to do more than just paying bills with my tight income. I'm more than happy to spare a little money to make differences in other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a well-known automaker, in a project to make safety devices.

lender.name: The Steward Family
lender.loan_because: It's a fun way for our family to learn about how others live and how we are all interconnected.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: We are one and we need to help each other through this wonderful journey of life.

lender.name: The Mock Family
lender.occupational_info: I run a restaurant, while my wife works for a social expression internet website company.

lender.name: payit forward
lender.loan_because: it's a simple yet grand concept - and my mom and i can help.

lender.name: Vera
lender.loan_because: We are all neighbors on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: As a student now, I am drawing together what I have learned as a teacher, entrepreneur and artist in the past.

lender.name: Buddy
lender.loan_because: This time it makes sence and I feel good that I can, and do...
